Category.Name: DeviceControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for Device information and control.
Category.Description: Category for Device information and control.

Category.Name: CxpLink
Category.ToolTip: Category for CXP Link information and control.
Category.Description: Category for CXP Link information and control.

Category.Name: ImageFormatControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for Image Format Control features.
Category.Description: Category for Image Format Control features.

Category.Name: AcquisitionControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for the acquisition and trigger control features.
Category.Description: Category for the acquisition and trigger control features.

Category.Name: AnalogControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the Analog control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the Analog control features.

Category.Name: UserSetControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the User Set control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the User Set control features.

Category.Name: DefectPixelCorrect
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the Defect pixel correct features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the Defect pixel correct features.

Category.Name: FpnCorrect
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the FPN correct features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the FPN correct features.

StringReg.Name: DeviceVendorName
StringReg.ToolTip: Name of the manufacturer of the device.
StringReg.Description: Name of the manufacturer of the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceFirmwareVersion
StringReg.ToolTip: Version of the firmware in the device.
StringReg.Description: Version of the firmware in the device.

Integer.Name: LinkReset
Integer.ToolTip: Resets the CxpLink to its power up state.
Integer.Description: Resets the CxpLink to its power up state.

Integer.Name: DeviceLinkID
Integer.ToolTip: ID of the Device link.
Integer.Description: ID of the Device link. A Link ID of 0 means that the link is a Master link.

Integer.Name: MasterHostLinkID
Integer.ToolTip: Host Link ID of the Host link connected to the Device Master link.
Integer.Description: Host Link ID of the Host link connected to the Device Master link. This register is set by the Host to a system wide (Host) unique 32 bit ID number as part of the Device discovery process.

Integer.Name: ControlPacketDataSize
Integer.ToolTip: The maximum control packet data size the Host can read from the Device.
Integer.Description: The maximum control packet data size the Host can read from the Device, or write to the Device, in multiples of 4 bytes.

Integer.Name: StreamPacketDataSize
Integer.ToolTip: The maximum stream packet data size the Host can accept.
Integer.Description: The maximum stream packet data size the Host can accept, in multiples of 4 bytes.

Enumeration.Name: LinkConfig
Enumeration.ToolTip: A valid combination of the Device link speed and number of active links.
Enumeration.Description: A valid combination of the Device link speed and number of active links.

Enumeration.Name: LinkConfigDefault
Enumeration.ToolTip: The value of the LinkConfig register that allows the Device to operate in its default mode.
Enumeration.Description: The value of the LinkConfig register that allows the Device to operate in its default mode.

Integer.Name: TestMode
Integer.ToolTip: Test packets transmission from Device to Host.
Integer.Description: Test packets transmission from Device to Host.

Integer.Name: TestErrorCountSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Select the required TestErrorCount[].
Integer.Description: Select the required TestErrorCount[].

Integer.Name: TestErrorCount
Integer.ToolTip: Provide the current link error count for the Device Link ID stored in register TestErrorCountSelector.
Integer.Description: Provide the current link error count for the Device Link ID stored in register TestErrorCountSelector.

Integer.Name: SensorWidth
Integer.ToolTip: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.

Integer.Name: SensorHeight
Integer.ToolTip: Effective height of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective height of the sensor in pixels.

Integer.Name: Width
Integer.ToolTip: Width of the Image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Width of the Image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: Height
Integer.ToolTip: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Horizontal offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Vertical offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).

Enumeration.Name: PixelFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Format of the pixel provided by the device.
Enumeration.Description: Format of the pixel provided by the device. It represents all the information provided by PixelCoding, PixelSize, PixelColorFilter but combined in a single value.

Enumeration.Name: TestImageSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of test image that is sent by the device.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of test image that is sent by the device.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.DisplayName: Image is coming from the sensor.

Enumeration.Name: TapGeometry
Enumeration.ToolTip: Describes the geometrical properties characterizing the taps of a CoaXPress camera as seen from the frame grabber or acquisition card.
Enumeration.Description: Describes the geometrical properties characterizing the taps of a CoaXPress camera as seen from the frame grabber or acquisition card.

Integer.Name: Image1StreamID
Integer.ToolTip: This gives the Stream ID of the primary image stream from the Device.
Integer.Description: This gives the Stream ID of the primary image stream from the Device.

Integer.Name: Image2StreamID
Integer.ToolTip: This gives the Stream ID of the secondary image stream from the Device.
Integer.Description: This gives the Stream ID of the secondary image stream from the Device.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the acquisition mode of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the acquisition mode of the device. It defines mainly the number of frames to capture during an acquisition and the way the acquisition stops.

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Frames are captured continuously until stopped with the AcquisitionStop command.
EnumEntry.Description: Frames are captured continuously until stopped with the AcquisitionStop command.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStart
Command.ToolTip: Starts the Acquisition of the device.
Command.Description: Starts the Acquisition of the device. The number of frames captured is specified by AcquisitionMode.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStop
Command.ToolTip: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame.
Command.Description: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame. It is mainly used when AcquisitionMode is Continuous but can be used in any acquisition mode.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of trigger to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of trigger to configure.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the selected trigger is active.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the selected trigger is active.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disables the selected trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Disables the selected trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enable the selected trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Enable the selected trigger.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source. The selected trigger must have its TriggerMode set to On.

EnumEntry.Name: Line0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: External source for the trigger signal.
EnumEntry.Description: External source for the trigger signal.

EnumEntry.Name: Line1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: CXP source for the trigger signal.
EnumEntry.Description: CXP source for the trigger signal.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: RisingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the rising edge of the source signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the rising edge of the source signal.

EnumEntry.Name: FallingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling edge of the source signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling edge of the source signal.

Enumeration.Name: ExposureMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter).
Enumeration.Description: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter).

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disables the Exposure and let the shutter open.
EnumEntry.Description: Disables the Exposure and let the shutter open.

EnumEntry.Name: Timed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Timed exposure.
EnumEntry.Description: Timed exposure.

EnumEntry.Name: TriggerWidth
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Random trigger shutter(Pulse width).
EnumEntry.Description: Random trigger shutter(Pulse width).

Float.Name: ExposureTimeAbs
Float.ToolTip: This feature is used to set the Exposure time (in microseconds) when ExposureMode is Timed.
Float.Description: This feature is used to set the Exposure time (in microseconds) when ExposureMode is Timed.

Integer.Name: GainRaw
Integer.ToolTip: This feature controls the selected gain as raw integer value.
Integer.Description: This feature controls the selected gain as raw integer value.

Integer.Name: BlackLevelRaw
Integer.ToolTip: This feature controls the analog black level as raw integer value.
Integer.Description: This feature controls the analog black level as raw integer value.

Enumeration.Name: BalanceRatioSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Balance ratio to control.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Balance ratio to control.

EnumEntry.Name: Red
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Balance Ratio will be applied to the red channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Balance Ratio will be applied to the red channel.

EnumEntry.Name: Blue
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Balance Ratio will be applied to the blue channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Balance Ratio will be applied to the blue channel.

Float.Name: BalanceRatioAbs
Float.ToolTip: This feature is used for white balancing. It represents the ratio of the selected color component to a reference color component.
Float.Description: This feature is used for white balancing. It represents the ratio of the selected color component to a reference color component.

Enumeration.Name: BalanceWhiteAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the mode for automatic white balancing between the color channels.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the mode for automatic white balancing between the color channels. The white balancing ratios are automatically adjusted.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: White balancing is manually controlled using BalanceRatioSelector and BalanceRatio.
EnumEntry.Description: White balancing is manually controlled using BalanceRatioSelector and BalanceRatio.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: White balancing is automatically adjusted once by the device. Once it has converged, it automatically returns to the Off state.
EnumEntry.Description: White balancing is automatically adjusted once by the device. Once it has converged, it automatically returns to the Off state.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the feature User Set to load, save or configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the feature User Set to load, save or configure.

EnumEntry.Name: Default
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the factory setting User set.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the factory setting User set.

Command.Name: UserSetLoad
Command.ToolTip: Loads the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the device and makes it active.
Command.Description: Loads the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the device and makes it active.

Command.Name: UserSetSave
Command.ToolTip: Save the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the non-volatile memory of the device.
Command.Description: Save the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the non-volatile memory of the device.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetDefaultSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the feature User Set to load and make active when the device is reset.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the feature User Set to load and make active when the device is reset.

Command.Name: DefectPixelSave
Command.ToolTip: Save the Defect Pixel Data to the non-volatile memory of the device.
Command.Description: Save the Defect Pixel Data to the non-volatile memory of the device.

Command.Name: DefectPixelErase
Command.ToolTip: Erase the Defect Pixel Data to the non-volatile memory of the device.
Command.Description: Erase the Defect Pixel Data to the non-volatile memory of the device.

Integer.Name: DefectPixelData
Integer.ToolTip: Set the Defect Pixel Data to the address corresponding to the DefectPixelDataIndex.
Integer.Description: Set the Defect Pixel Data to the address corresponding to the DefectPixelDataIndex. Data format is bit31-24:fixed 0, bit23-12:horizontal coordinate, bit11-0:vertical coordinate.

Integer.Name: DefectPixelDataNum
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the number of defective pixel correction.
Integer.Description: Specifies the number of defective pixel correction.

Enumeration.Name: DefectPixelCorrectEnable
Enumeration.ToolTip: Control if the defective pixel correction is enable.
Enumeration.Description: Control if the defective pixel correction is enable.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disable the defective pixel correction.
EnumEntry.Description: Disable the defective pixel correction.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enable the defective pixel correction.
EnumEntry.Description: Enable the defective pixel correction.

Enumeration.Name: FpnCorrectSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the feature FPN Correct to load, save.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the feature FPN Correct to load, save.

EnumEntry.Name: Plane0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the factory setting FPN Correct.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the factory setting FPN Correct.

Command.Name: FpnCorrectLoad
Command.ToolTip: Load the FPN Correct Data to the non-volatile memory of the device.
Command.Description: Load the FPN Correct Data to the non-volatile memory of the device.

Command.Name: FpnCorrectSave
Command.ToolTip: Save the FPN Correct Data to the non-volatile memory of the device.
Command.Description: Save the FPN Correct Data to the non-volatile memory of the device.

Command.Name: FpnCorrectGenerate
Command.Description: Generate the FPN Correct Data. If FpnCorrectEnable ON, data that is generated will be reflected in the image immediately.

Enumeration.Name: FpnCorrectEnable
Enumeration.ToolTip: Control if the FPN correction is enable.
Enumeration.Description: Control if the FPN correction is enable.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disable the FPN correction.
EnumEntry.Description: Disable the FPN correction.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enable the FPN correction.
EnumEntry.Description: Enable the FPN correction.

Port.Name: Device
Port.ToolTip: Port node giving access to the camera.
Port.Description: The default port of the device.

Integer.Name: TLParamsLocked
Integer.ToolTip: This feature is able to temporarily locking control by transport layer.
Integer.Description: To temporarily lock for regarding parameters lock : 1 when grab, unlock : 0 when not grab.
